PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing
==================================================

.. py:module:: PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing.is_number
   PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing.count_sigfigs
   PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing.count_sig_digits_bias
   PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing.findWholeWord
   PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing.whole_word_detect
   PyUncertainNumber.NLP_constructor.language_parsing.hedge_interpret


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: is_number(n)

   check if a string is a number


.. py:function:: count_sigfigs(numstr: str) -> int

   Count the number of significant figures in a number string


.. py:function:: count_sig_digits_bias(number)

   to count the bias for the getting the significant digits after the decimal point

   .. note:: - to exclude the sig digits before the decimal point


.. py:function:: findWholeWord(w)

   Find a whole word in a string

   .. note:: - this returns the matched word, but not directly a boolean


.. py:function:: whole_word_detect(word, string)

   Detect if a whole word is in a string, return y or n


.. py:function:: hedge_interpret(text)

   interpret linguistic hedge words into UncertainNumber objects
